Package org.Utils

Class Command

java.lang.Object
org.Utils.Command
public class Command extends Object
Utility class to handle the Command received from players.

    • getMainOperation

      public String getMainOperation() throws InvalidCommand
      Method returns the Main Operation of the command.
      Returns:
      String : Main operation substring of the command
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : In case wrong operation is provided

      Method handles command string related to editing continents
      Returns:
      HashMap : of the all the add and remove based arguments
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - : In case wrong operation is provided.
